comments:
An error occurs after creating a new SQL File, when it tries to open the file in the sqlscrapbook. The .log entry is below.

I created a new Eclipse installation with
JDK 1.4.2_06
eclipse-SDK-3.3-win32.zip
emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-2.2.2.zip
GEF-ALL-3.3.zip
dtp-sdk_1.6M4_N120307.zip  (the DTP 1.6 nightly build for Dec 3, 2007)

After creating an ASA 10 driver definition and a Connection Profile for the ASA 10.0.1 demo database, I created a new SQL File through the "SQL File" wizard. On hitting finish, the wizard tries to open the .sql file in the SQL File editor (sqlscrapbook) and it fails to open, with this entry in the .log


org.eclipse.core.runtime.AssertionFailedException: null argument:
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isNotNull(Assert.java:84)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isNotNull(Assert.java:72)
	at org.eclipse.ui.texteditor.AbstractTextEditor.setHelpContextId(AbstractTextEditor.java:2678)
	at org.eclipse.datatools.sqltools.sqleditor.SQLEditor.initializeEditor(SQLEditor.java:1307)
	at org.eclipse.datatools.sqltools.internal.sqlscrapbook.editor.SQLScrapbookEditor.initializeEditor(SQLScrapbookEditor.java:127)
	at org.eclipse.ui.texteditor.AbstractDecoratedTextEditor.<init>(AbstractDecoratedTextEditor.java:278)
	at org.eclipse.ui.editors.text.TextEditor.<init>(TextEditor.java:57)
	at org.eclipse.datatools.sqltools.sqleditor.SQLEditor.<init>(SQLEditor.java:537)
	at org.eclipse.datatools.sqltools.internal.sqlscrapbook.editor.SQLScrapbookEditor.<init>(SQLScrapbookEditor.java:119)
	at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.java:39)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.java:27)

Hui,

Please fix as soon as possible -- the SQL does not work with any SQL files or DB connection in the 12/5 build.
Hui has reverted the necessary code.
